english_example_sentence: Old friends were going to bring us nice gifts tomorrow.
russian_example_sentence: Старые друзья собирались принести нам хорошие подарки завтра.
turkish_example_sentence: Eski dostlar yarın bize güzel hediyeler getirecektiler.
